verses.roman:
a-kalaṅka gauracandra dilā daraśana
sa-kalaṅka candre āra kon prayojana

synonyms: a-kalaṅka—without contamination; gauracandra—the moon of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dilā—gave; daraśana—audience; sa-kalaṅka—with contamination; candre—for a moon; āra—also; kon—what; prayojana—necessity.
translation: When the spotless moon of Caitanya Mahāprabhu became visible, what would be the need for a moon full of black marks on its body?
